definition: a contract between two or more persons who agree to pool talent and money and share profits or losses
details:
noun
- a contract between two or more persons who agree to pool talent and money and share profits or losses
- the members of a business venture created by contract
- a cooperative relationship between people or groups who agree to share responsibility for achieving some specific goal
= example: a cooperative relationship between people or groups who agree to share responsibility for achieving some specific goal
